name: Bulls&Cows (luispaez09)
description:
Controls:

Mouse : Move camera

W: Forward

S: Backwards

A: Left

D:Right

P or ESC : Pause Game

Press TAB after clicking the sign to start typing, press tab again to stop typing.

RULES:

No numbers starting with 0

No repeated digits

Number must be 4 digits, not more or less

Cow = Right number, wrong place

Bull = Right number, right place

Share your highest score in the comments!

Please report any bugs or feedback and I will reply as fast as possible
